member.name: IBitmapData.CopyBytesTo
member.summary: Copies up to the specified maximum number of bytes from the given offset in the bitmap data into the caller’s buffer (pvBytes), and returns the number of bytes copied.
member.param: The place in the bitmap data to start copying from, in bytes.
The maximum number of bytes to copy.
The buffer into which the bytes are copied.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBitmapData.GetBitmapDescription
member.summary: Gets a BitmapDescription that describes the bitmap data stored in the IBitmapData.
member.param: Information about the bitmap stored in the IBitmapData.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBitmapData.GetSourceBitmapDescription
member.summary: Gets a BitmapDescription that describes the original format of the bitmap data stored in the IBitmapData.
member.param: Information about the original format of the bitmap stored in the IBitmapData.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBitmapData.GetStride
member.summary: Gets the stride of the data. This is the length in bytes of each row of the bitmap.
member.param: The length in bytes of each row of the bitmap.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBitmapData
member.summary: Represents an image associated with a node in the visual tree.
